text: Shi ta [an la] cong yige ren [a dan] chuangzaole nimen, you cong nage ren [a dan] chuangzaole ta de qizi [ha wa], yibian ta tong ta huode shenghuo zhi le. Dang ta tong ta fangshi hou, ta huaiyunle, dan ta neng zhaochang shenghuo. Dang ta gandao tai'er chen chong shi, ta lia bian qiqiu an la——ta lia de zhu:“Jiaru ni ci gei women yige jianquan de haizi, women yiding zuo gan'en zhe.”
